# extend(atStart:)

**Instance Method**

Extends the selection from its start toward the beginning of the document.

## Declaration

```swift
func extend(atStart precede: Int)
```

## Discussion

The selection may be extended by any amount, up to and including the beginning of the document.

## Modifying a Selection

- **add(_:)**: Adds the specified selection to the receiving selection.
- **add(_:)**: Adds the specified array of selections to the receiving selection.
- **extend(atEnd:)**: Extends the selection from its end toward the end of the document.
